item.title: ctfs && recon
item.description: We’ll get started at 13:05 week01 what is a ctf && recon disclaimer dont be mean acknowledgement of country what will we cover this session what is a CTF what types of vulnerabilities are there reconnaissance what is it/when do you use it passive active what are we going to cover later 01 what is a ctf/recon 02 frontend web exploits 03 backend web exploits 04 digital forensics 05 network forensics 06 binary exploitation 07 further binary exploitation 08 privilege escalation what is a ctf essentially a “hacking” competition
